devdoc.details: Call these functions as dry-run transactions for the frontend.

params._nativeSymbolMarket: Represents the symbol of the market for the native gas token, such as jAVAX
params._rewardDistributor: The reward distributor for this contract

params._account: The account who's limits are being retrieved
The account that will receive the rewards
The account who's balances are being retrieved
params._jToken: The market to retrieve account's balances for

jTokenBalances(address,address).return: An account's balances in a market

params._account: The account who's balances are being retrieved
params._jTokens: All markets to retrieve account's balances for

jTokenBalancesAll(address[],address).return: An account's balances in requested markets

params._jToken: The market to get metadata for

params._jTokens: All markets that metadata is being requested for

params._admin: The address of the new admin

params._newRewardDistributor: The address of the new reward distributor

methods.constructor: Constructor function that initializes the native symbol and administrator for this contract

getClaimableRewards(uint8,address,addres.notice: Claims available rewards of a given reward type for an account

jTokenBalances(address,address).notice: Get an account's balances in a market

jTokenBalancesAll(address[],address).notice: Get market balances for an account

jTokenMetadata(address).notice: Get metadata for a given market

setAdmin(address).notice: Admin function to set new admin address

setRewardDistributor(address).notice: Admin function to set new reward distributor address

userdoc.notice: This is a version of JoeLens that contains write transactions and pulls reward speeds from a RewardDistributor. JoeLensV2 mainly makes calls to various contracts to retrieve market/account data from our lending platform and wraps it up nicely to be sent to the frontend.
